mapper.sql: a.id, a.state, a.watch_time, a.watch_by, a.watch_records, a.end_time, a.task_id, t.id AS "task.id", t.task_name AS "task.taskName", u.id AS "watchUser.id", u.name AS "watchUser.name", f.name AS "facility.name"
LEFT JOIN task t ON t.id = a.task_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.watch_by LEFT JOIN facility f ON f.domain = t.facility_domain
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM watch a
WHERE a.state = 1
AND a.watch_by = #{userId}

SELECT
FROM watch_#{year}_#{month} a
WHERE a.state = 1
AND a.watch_by = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO watch( id, state, watch_time, watch_by, watch_records, end_time, task_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{state}, #{watchTime}, #{watchBy}, #{watchRecords}, #{endTime}, #{taskId} )
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS watch ( id int AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '编号', watch_time datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '值守开始时间', watch_by int COMMENT '值守人', watch_records varchar(20000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '巡检记录', state int COMMENT '值守状态', end_time datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '值守完成时间', task_id int COMMENT '值守任务id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) COMMENT='值守表';
INSERT INTO watch SELECT * FROM watch_#{year}_#{month} WHERE end_time is null;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM watch_#{year}_#{month} WHERE end_time is null;
